Yagiz Erkan wrote:
> Hi all,
> 
> I'm testing a class that Spring creates an instance for me at runtime
> (and my code is using it through the interface type) therefore I never
> do "new MyClass()" in the production code. In the programmer tests,
> would you use the same method of creating the concrete class or would
> you call new MyClass() to keep it simple?

If you do the same thing Spring does, but more simply, then that ought 
to be good enough.
-- 
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
